text:
Since the jasper generates code like this:

int name  = null ;


When declaring a variable, defined in a tei class, 
it is not possible to define simple types variables as variables to a taglib.
creator: kip@bording.dk
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
The spec only allows classes to be defined in TagExtraInfo.  Simple types are 
not allowed.
